SELECT INSP.RSC_INSP_CODE, INSP.RSC_INSP_DATE, INSP.RSC_CD_CODE, INSP.RSC_INSP_VOL, INSP.RSC_INFER_VOL, INSP.RSC_PASS_VOL, INSP.RSC_INSP_ST, INSP.RSC_INSP_REMK,
RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME, RSCCODE.RSC_CD_UNIT,
EMP.EMP_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_INSP INSP LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSCCODE ON INSP.RSC_CD_CODE = RSCCODE.RSC_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON INSP.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
ORDER BY 1 DESC
